typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PR_ID as integer,
		PR_Name as string,
		PR_Lead as string,
		EXPENSES as double,
		LATITUDE as double,
		LONGITUDE as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingEentries
ExistingEentries alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> DeleteEntries
DeleteEntries sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PR_ID as integer,
		PR_Name as string,
		PR_Lead as string,
		EXPENSES as double,
		LATITUDE as double,
		LONGITUDE as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ClearDatabase
